events.comment: promenne, ktere ma na sobe avatah (postava hrace) by meli byt glob. promenne - aby byly prenaseny mezi nactenim layoutu

action.name: Import tmx
action.param: "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <map version='1.0' orientation='orthogonal' width='40' height='20' tilewidth='34' tileheight='34'> <tileset firstgid='1' name='sett' tilewidth='34' tileheight='34'> <image source='tiles/sett.png' width='306' height='34'/> <tile id='0'> <properties> <property name='Solid' value='1'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='1'> <properties> <property name='Solid' value='0'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='2'> <properties> <property name='Solid' value='0'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='3'> <properties> <property name='Solid' value='0'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='4'> <properties> <property name='Solid' value='0'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='5'> <properties> <property name='Solid' value='0'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='6'> <properties> <property name='Monster' value='Star'/> <property name='Solid' value='0'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='7'> <properties> <property name='transportTarget' value='2'/> </properties> </tile> <tile id='8'> <properties> <property name='worldMap' value='1'/> </properties> </tile> </tileset> <layer name='map' width='40' height='20'> <data encoding='base64'>  </data> </layer> <layer name='monsters' width='40' height='20'> <data encoding='base64'>  </data> </layer> </map> "

sub-events.comment: od hrace odecitat tolik zivotu, kolik ma enemy utok (zde napevno a nahodne zvoleno 10) -> radek 19
toto by mozna melo byt nekde v Main, zde ale vice logicke (reseni co s mrtvym hracem hned za odecitanim zivotu)

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Box looted, mega ultra mini booster found."
